title: The racist match of the year
body: There is this player called [REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)] who and 2 of his friends that were racist and being in defence of being racist in this match. Myself and trist on my team found it offensive. Please riot check the chat logs and ban who you need to ban. Its people like these that cause the culture of what happened in NZ and it needs to be stomped out in all forms, thanks for your time reading this.
